Burma: English and Dutch East India companies close branches in Burma
Philippine: Francisco Coloma appointed Governor-General (1677) by the Audiencia Real.
Francisco Sotomayor y Mansilla appointed Governor-General (1677–1678) by the Audiencia Real.
Sweden: The Siege of Malmö takes place.
The Battle of Landskrona takes place.
USA: The Province of Maine was absorbed by the Massachusetts Bay Colony.
